preqs: Must be enrolled in Executive Master of Public Administration (EMPA)

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3801, A6014}

description: The unit focuses on the key institutions of Australian government including the federal constitution and comparisons with a state constitution, the operation of the parliament, the formation and operation of an executive government under the auspices of the Westminster model, and the incidence of power sharing between national and state government. The unit seeks to investigate the capacity of Australian governance to deliver national policy in a federated system.
